tab1.text1:
This is a no wipe cluster.

Join discord to #verify-discord to gain more points per hour.

8 points per hour if unverified
10 points per hour if verified.

FTARK is non-P2W, and will always stay that way. Points can only be acquired by playing.

tab2.text1:
1) Meshing, using meshed bases, exploiting terrain, or utilizing structure glitches are prohibited.

2) Banter and trash talk are permissible within limits, avoid toxicity. Keep trash talk centered on the game with no personal attacks.

3) Do not exploit building mechanics on platforms or rafts to avoid turret damage or breach enemy bases. Structures on platforms shouldn't fully enclose dinos or players, except for the rider. For all platform dinos, don't build under the platform. Tek Rifle 'tunnels' on rafts/platforms are not allowed (they are allowed with non-platofrm building).
tab2.text2:
4) ORP Fobs are not allowed. In addition, do not use multiple tribes to ORP block (such as ORP blocking a cave entrace with one tribe, and playing behind in another, assuming there is only 1 entrance to the cave).

5) Tribe, player, and dino names, along with any custom text, should exclude derogatory or discriminatory terms. The prohibited words are generally intuitive. If in doubt, ask for clarification. Report offensive terms, but remember that the final decision on their appropriateness rests with an admin.

6) Exploiting game mechanics to gain an unfair advantage in anyway that is not covered by previous rules is covered here. I can't think of every potential cheat/exploit in advance. I will take action case by case if a dispute happens.

tab3.text1:
6x Taming, Gathering, Experience, and Breeding. This also depends on day count. See 'No Wipe Details'

Players and Dinos gain 2x increased weight per point.

Eurypterids/Trilobites drop 5x black pearls. Other sources remain vanilla.

Dino max level = 180

Dino level distrubution is similar to Rag and Center (slightly better)

Easier boss fights + easier ascension + all explorer note unlocks are on the shop.
tab3.text2:
White Drops: Artifacts and tribute items (helps to balance ORP cave building)

Blue Drops: Mid-tier flak armor and weapons.

Green Drops: every saddle, with a 20% chance of getting a Blueprint.

All other drops: Vanilla

Food and water drain rates reduced by 30%.

tab4.title1: Life Cycle of Main FTARK Servers
tab4.text1:
Day 0-450
Transfers in: Characters
Transfers out: Characters, Items, Dinos
10x All
Hard ORP
  1 Bubble: 15000 unit radius
  20 min Raid Log Penalty
  40 min ORP Activation

Day 450-900
Transfers in: Characters, Items, Dinos
Transfers out: Characters, Items, Dinos
8x All
Hard ORP
  1 Bubble: 15000 unit radius
  40 min Raid Log Penalty
  40 min ORP Activation

Day 900-1800
Transfers in: Characters, Items, Dinos
Transfers out: Characters, Items, Dinos
6x All
Soft ORP (5x turret dmg, 10% structure damage)
  1 Bubble: 15000 unit radius
  60 min Raid Log Penalty
  40 min ORP Activation
tab4.text2:
Day 1800+
Same settings as 900-1800
If the server has at least 4 peak players in the past 7 days, then it passes the check, the server is given another 900 days (2 months). And then the check is repeated.
If the server fails the pop check, a 30 day extinction event starts. Players will have 30 days to move to a different server on the cluster. Players will always have newer servers to move to, no 2 servers have the same day count.
Important: The pop check only happens on duplicated maps. For example, if there is only 1 Center map. There will never be a pop check on that map.

tab5.text1: Every month, our 20x Island starter server is reset. The basic idea is to give starting players 3 weeks of 20x, and 1 week of full transfers out + 10x. This server is for new players, or for players that have been wiped and want to rebuild with a boost.
tab5.text2:
Day 1-300: (3 weeks)
- No transfers are allowed.

Day 300-450: (1 week)
Character transfers allowed in.
Characters + Items + Dinos allowed out.
Server is reset at day 450.

All items on the shop are 50% cheaper, but shop points do not carry over to main servers.
